organizers.philosophy: Having played at the state level three times, I believe in pushing limits, competing with integrity, and inspiring others through my journey.

organizers.sports_background: 2-time winner and 2-time runner-up in the PBEL City Volleyball League
organizers.philosophy: I believe in relentless effort, resilience, and the pursuit of excellence—both on and off the court.

organizers.sports_background: Played cricket at state and university levels. Represented his district at age-group level for Kho-Kho, Throwball, Table Tennis, and Cricket. Finished his first full marathon this year.
organizers.philosophy: Passion, perseverance, and pushing limits define me—state and university-level cricketer, multi-sport athlete, and marathon finisher, always striving for excellence.

organizers.sports_background: National Volleyball Player and runner-up in last year's PBEL Volleyball League
organizers.philosophy: Dedication, discipline, and teamwork define my journey. As a National Volleyball Player, I believe in pushing limits, inspiring others, and striving for excellence on and off the court.
Passion, discipline, and excellence define my journey.
